resources.string: Displays the current Desert Bus For Hope shift as your wallpaper.
Just use the normal shift banners

Turning this on will cause periodic network calls to the VST to check if it\'s Omega Shift. Even though the VST is generally on the ball with that, this won\'t check very frequently, so it might pick it up a few minutes late. Also, this won\'t make any network calls at all unless it\'s November.
